1.content: one day your checking your yugioh cards the girl ones to be percise you say to yourself, man i wish i could become one of those girl monsters then you start to morph into.......
1.title: Yugi huh?

11.content: what changes first? *by the way I decided to change her boots just by having 5" heels*
11.title: Dark Magician Girl

choices: still one part at a time
111.content: you see ur shoes change into blue boots with pink stripes lil yellow circles and 5" heels which you fall in, then ur pants becomes a pink miniskirt. your shirt becomes blue with more pink stripes lil green orb pink cape and shoulder pads appear, then handless blue gloves with more pink stripes appear. a choker appears on the neck, pink earrings appear on ur ears a blue staff with pink stripes appears in ur hand and a blue hat with yet more pink stripes appear. you put the staff down, what changes next?
111.title: clothes

1111.content: you start to get smaller but still sorta the same height because of heels, all hair except on your head vanishes. your arms legs hands & feet become small and femine, your butt, & hips grow your chest two B cup boobs appear. ur hair get's longer & turns blonde. you feel your face & voice changing, when you speak it comes out high. you look in the mirror to see dark magician girl looking at you, http://adventorder.files.wordpress.com/2... you see pink oval's on your face. you're 100% Dark Magician Girl. you........
1111.title: whole body *remain in real world*

11111.content: Mmmmm, where shall you go?
11111.title: go out

choices: New Clothes, don't like the current ones you wear
111111.content: You decide to go shopping for...
111111.title: Marketplace

choices: Relise people are staring at you
111112.content: You see so many stalls up at cheap prices...all eyes are one you, men drool at you...even some girls do.. Though you don't notice it yet.
111112.title: Black Market

choices: turn them into girls with magic
1111121.content: what would do you do
1111121.title: Relise people are staring at you

113.content:
as you were looking though your cards you stop at dark magian girl. "man I would like to be her" to your self. You feel a little tingle in your throat but you brush it off. then for no reason you started to cough and as you did it sounded more famine. "that was weird. oh my god I sound like a girl. " you said

what changes next?
113.title: voice

114.content: dark magician girl is looking puzzled at whats happening as she slowly shrank to two feet tall. What happens next?
114.title: height

13.content: What changes first as you slowly become the Silent Magician?
13.title: Silence is golden.

choices: Um, I don't like mermaids. Next!!
15.content: Here are some "fishier" choices, and an option to keep the option tree alive, because everyone loves option trees!! Viva la option trees!!
15.title: Fish Market

choices: A Giant shell appears behind you
Your legs change to a fish tail
153.content: What do you notice first?
153.title: Red Archery Girl

155.content: Maybe a personification of a monster that doesn't look human?
155.title: Um, I don't like mermaids. Next!!

1551.content:
We'll start with either (Dark) Dimesonal Demons or Quliphorts.

Quliphorts are Pendulum archetype made of alien spaceships and monoliths.

D/D & D/D/D......is Declan/Reji's deck. Complicated to use, but fun as fuck to pull off correctly. D/D(/D)'s are demons from another dimension, and some of them are named after famous people.

Pick your poison.....
1551.title: PERSONA

1552.content: Maybe an anthro version of some female monsters...
1552.title: Female Anthro monsters

15523.content: Here is something that couple make the story a little or a lot more interesting. How about being able to change and split into multiply monster girls? Here is a couple of choices:
15523.title: Split to Multiple Monster Girls

choices: Maiden and Priestess with Eyes of Blue
Monster girls from the archetypes of Ray's fragments
155233.content: How about these? The first choice is for all of them.
155233.title: Another split transformation/Monster girl

info.brief_description: you turn into a female monster from yugioh
info.description: just like in the description the only character is John 13 you, you can only become female duel monsters, it happens slow, no killing, no sex. small swearing, takes place during summer vacation mom and dad left till the end of the summer and older sis at college, i'm allowed to change the clothes that morph or a adjustment.
